member.name: IFileSystemImageResult.get_BlockSize
member.summary: Retrieves the size, in bytes, of a block of data.
member.param: Number of bytes in a block.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFileSystemImageResult.get_DiscId
member.summary: Retrieves the disc volume name for this file system image.
member.param: String that contains the volume name for this file system image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFileSystemImageResult.get_ImageStream
member.param: An interface of the burn image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Pointer is not valid or the pstatstgis parameter of the method is NULL.
Value: 0x80004003

Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E
The grfStateFlag parameter of the method is invalid.

member.name: IFileSystemImageResult.get_ProgressItems
member.summary: Retrieves the progress item block mapping collection.
member.param: An interface that contains a collection of progress items. Each progress item identifies the blocks written since the previous progress status was taken.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IFileSystemImageResult.get_TotalBlocks
member.summary: Retrieves the number of blocks in the result image.
member.param: Number of blocks to burn on the disc.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

summary.para: Use this interface to get information about the burn image, the image data stream, and progress information.
To get this interface, call the method.
